title: Bloomberg Markets: Cooley on Tax Impact on Medical Devices
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cooley on Tax Impact on Medical Devices
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Chris Cooley\u0010Senior Equity Research Analyst of Medical Device & Hospital Supply\u0010Stephens \u0010Discussing the impact of tax reform on the medical devices sector. He says repatriation of offshore capital is critical – the vast majority of cash holdings at medical device makers is held offshore, and would need to be brought back to reinvest in innovation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
